message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.MM. 

The paper deals with the use of attention mechanisms in Neural Machine Translation (NMT) for multimodal tasks, specifically for translating from English and images to German. This involves both natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) techniques, which are covered by the cs.CL and cs.CV sub-categories respectively. The paper also evaluates the ability of the model to make use of images to improve translation, which involves machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques, covered by the cs.AI sub-category. The paper presents experimental results and compares different attention mechanisms, which involves statistical learning (SL) and machine learning (ML) techniques, covered by the cs.LG sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with multimodal translation, which involves both NLP and CV, and is covered by the cs.MM sub-category.
